volumeInfo.title: B.P.R.D. Vol. 1: Hollow Earth and Other Stories
volumeInfo.description: Hollow Earth, by Mike Mignola, Chris Golden, Tom Sniegoski, and Ryan Sook, revealed the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense's struggle to save Agent Liz Sherman, and their struggle to deal with life without Hellboy. That story is collected here with rare Hellboy-related stories, long sought after by fans of Mignola's hit comic. Reprinted here are the first solo Abe Sapien comic, Drums of the Dead, by Brian McDonald and Derek Thompson, as well as the short stories "Abe Sapien versus Science" and "Lobster Johnson: Killer Inside My Skull." If these names mean nothing to you, you've been missing out on the greatest adventure saga comics has to offer. If you do know these names, then this is the collection you've been asking for.
